5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Sayyar b. Salama reported:I heard Abu Barza saying that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) did not mind some delay in the 'Isha' prayer even up to midnight and he did not like sleeping before (observing it) and talking after it. Shu'ba said: I again met him (Sayyar b. Salama) for the second time and he said: Even up to the third (part) of the night

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِحْبَابِ التَّبْكِيرِ بِالصُّبْحِ فِي أَوَّلِ وَقْتِهَا وَهُوَ التَّغْلِيسُ وَبَيَانِ قَدْرِ الْقِرَاءَةِ فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: It is recommended to pray Subh early, at the beginning of its time, when it is still dark; and the length of recitation therein
